languages.text: "Признает ли Вольный Торговец свою {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}связь с ксеносами{/d}, служение им в качестве марионетки и отречение от света Бога-Императора во имя своих еретических желаний и нижайшей выгоды?"

traits.locale_text: "Признает ли Вольный Торговец свою связь с ксеносами, служение им в качестве марионетки и отречение от света Императора во имя своих еретических желаний и нижайшей выгоды?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"
languages.original_text: "Признает ли Вольный Торговец свою {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}связь с ксеносами{/d}, служение им в качестве марионетки и отречение от света Бога-Императора во имя своих еретических желаний и нижайшей выгоды?"

traits.locale_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to fraternizing with the xenos, serving them as a puppet and rejecting God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profits?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"

languages.text: « {Mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} admet-{mf|il|elle} avoir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternisé avec les xénos{/d}, les avoir servis telle une marionnette et avoir rejeté la lumière bénie de l'Empereur-Dieu au profit de ses désirs hérétiques et pour son enrichissement personnel ? »
languages.original_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"

traits.locale_text: « {Mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} admet-{mf|il|elle} avoir fraternisé avec les xénos, les avoir servis telle une marionnette et avoir rejeté la lumière bénie de l'Empereur-Dieu au profit de ses désirs hérétiques et pour son enrichissement personnel ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人是否承认{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}与异形为伍{/d}？是否承认充当异形的傀儡。为了满足异形的欲望与肮脏的利益，拒绝接受神皇的祝福之光？”
languages.original_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人是否承认与异形为伍？是否承认充当异形的傀儡。为了满足异形的欲望与肮脏的利益，拒绝接受神皇的祝福之光？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}異種族と交わり{/d}、操り人形として彼らに仕え、己の異端な欲望と卑しい利益のために神帝陛下の祝福された光を拒んだことを認めるか？」
languages.original_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}異種族と交わり{/d}、操り人形として彼らに仕え、己の異端な欲望と卑しい利益のために神帝陛下の祝福された光を拒んだことを認めるか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Gibt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu, sich {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}mit den Xenos verbrüdert zu haben{/d}, als ihre Marionette aufgetreten zu sein und sich vom gesegneten Licht des Gottimperators abgekehrt zu haben, nur um {mf|seinen|ihren} ketzerischen Begierden nachzugehen und mehr Gewinne einzustreichen?"
languages.original_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"

traits.locale_text: "Gibt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu, sich mit den Xenos verbrüdert zu haben, als ihre Marionette aufgetreten zu sein und sich vom gesegneten Licht des Gottimperators abgekehrt zu haben, nur um {mf|seinen|ihren} ketzerischen Begierden nachzugehen und mehr Gewinne einzustreichen?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Admite {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}confraternizó con xenos{/d}, actuando como su marioneta y repudiando la bendita luz del Dios Emperador en aras de sus deseos heréticos y de un vulgar ánimo de lucro?».
languages.original_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Admite {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente que confraternizó con xenos, actuando como su marioneta y repudiando la bendita luz del Dios Emperador en aras de sus deseos heréticos y de un vulgar ánimo de lucro?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir; {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}zenolarla dostane ilişkiler kurduğunu{/d}, onların kuklası olarak hareket ettiğini, Tanrı İmparator'un kutsal ışığını kâfirce arzuları nedeniyle ve sırf kazanç elde etme uğruna reddettiğini itiraf ediyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "Does the Rogue Trader admit to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YouServed}fraternising with the xenos{/d}, serving them as a puppet, and rejecting the God-Emperor's blessed light for the sake of {mf|his|her} heretical desires and base profit?"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, zenolarla dostane ilişkiler kurduğunu, onların kuklası olarak hareket ettiğini ve Tanrı İmparator'un kutsal ışığını kâfirce arzuları nedeniyle ve kâr elde etme amacıyla reddettiğini itiraf ediyor mu?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
